cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 2.8)
if(${JVX_OS} MATCHES "windows")
	set(JVX_TARGET_NAME "fftw-3.3-win")
	message("--> Configuring ${JVX_TARGET_NAME}")
	project(${JVX_TARGET_NAME})
	if(JVX_PLATFORM MATCHES "32bit")
		install(DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Win32/ DESTINATION ${INSTALL_PATH_LIB_SHARED} FILES_MATCHING COMPONENT fftw3 PATTERN "*.dll")
	else()
		install(DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/x64/ DESTINATION ${INSTALL_PATH_LIB_SHARED} FILES_MATCHING COMPONENT fftw3 PATTERN "*.dll")
	endif()
endif(${JVX_OS} MATCHES "windows")
